Reviews.Title: “Average Marriott Experience”
Reviews.Author: red_x_oktober
Reviews.Content: recently night stay business trip hotel conveniently located fairly close airport near appeared airport shuttle operation im comes complimentary theres fee involved lobby clean elegant scaled size marriott hotels ive visited check prompt clean perfunctory laid style marriott bathroom spacious front door entrance double beds tv cabinet desk workspace armchair stay marriott hotel visible electric outlets near beds charging phone overnight party experienced appeared glance inspection found bar soap bathroom trash floor coffee cup trash im exactly happened switched promptly internet access free hotel neither guest nor lobby paid 995 access noon day packages available cant blame hotel charging internet access am looking forward day hotels include nightly rate couple party shocked extra werent surprised im hotel chains accustomed staying surprise arent charged extra im charging extra towels based stay didnt strike neighborhood town dont rental car arent prepared pay cab wander dinner property

Reviews.Title: “Nothing out of the ordinary..”
Reviews.Author: ez369
Reviews.Content: recently stayed sunday night using reward night cost complimentary checking immediately recognized elite times requests confirmed placed 9th floor service front desk friendly cordial alluded previous reviews location hotel freeway pretty close residential ill agree doesnt appear neighborhoods usually neighborhoods near airports arent maybe 5 minutes airport plus hindsight maybe booked downtown enjoy wandering downtown beale street downtown beale st share panhandlers clean bed comfortable requested extra pillows reviewers noted tell aging property probably time refresh hallways tube tv didnt dine property service drinks hotel bar service fine appeared bar closed midnight sun night overall hotel experience average perfectly fine service

Reviews.Title: “Generally OK I suppose”
Reviews.Author: MDH_CoClare
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel times past overall fair ok bedrooms stayed pretty tired shabby stage overall clean beds comfortable staff helpful friendly welcoming food bar restaurant isnt dependable simple stuff draft beer taps rarely properly difficult fix breakfast ok little expensive serving stale lettuce inedible croutons caesar salad demonstrates basic lack effort opinion investing decorating tvs probably understand excuse comes food

Reviews.Title: “So-so”
Reviews.Author: larryderm
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel twice ten day period time nice required change due broken toilet cleaning exemplified dirty telephone pity charge internet

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel for Out of Way Location”
Reviews.Author: Charlie_Hotlanta
Reviews.Content: hotel located miles east airport airport noice near pretty downtown memphis head dinner ive stayed times staff pleasant efficient nice typical marriott excellent beds decent workout facility running outside probably options little suspect receive free buffet breakfast checkin recent visit nice touch parking onsite free ample

Reviews.Title: “Missing items in hotel room turns ugly”
Reviews.Author: harmarsstar
Reviews.Content: pretty location alright parking expensive easy left wedding ring morning confident calling grab called called afternoon tried multiple times contact balls tell ring gone understand left ring iâ€™ve fault treat customers disrespect rudeness terrible feeling cant hotel decency speak hotel guest manager doesnt decency couldnt call sorry looked love appreciate patience understanding dragging 2 weeks actually speak marriot staff guests hopefully forget hotel staff helped time called resolved

Reviews.Title: “Feels like home”
Reviews.Author: suncoastrider
Reviews.Content: experiencing rude customer service earlier stays memphis hotels including downtown marriott little leery visit stayed nights fail treated professionally feel home rare staff courteous board hats management particularly recognize epitome customer service location close airport dining options hotel little bit drive truly inclement weather quibble televisions updating beautiful hotel staff crappy tvs stay quibbles

Reviews.Content: hotel hotel granted hotel sleep priority bar pool koi pond restaurant 30 unlimited porn packages love favorite hideaway hotel location gates feel safer office complex street okay 129 itll cost real features view top floor roof sunset cocktails roof koi pond read super private aft 9pm occasional bar smokers lobby outside bar dine meal breakfast til 12am service closes bar excellent lounging relaxing typically encounter business people pool awesome private nice hotel couples rewards taking advantage concierge lounge top floor flatscreen tvs books free food premium liquor free breakfast food upstairs evening cocktail session lounge awesome til 10pm premium drinks hot appetizers nuts cheese fruits yogurts waters free soda free pay repeatedly client vip card lounge dont million means figure harm giving obviously youve properties card access entire floor hop elevator pop door doesnt watch whoever card please looking brand facility screams million dollar renovation looking hotel decent fun sleep quality ill honest past 6am hang despise business hotels 3 inches hair insists shampooing blowdrying 20mins 630 whirring blow dryers stop 930 business ppl complaint ive 2005

Reviews.Title: “Better Than Expected.....”
Reviews.Author: AZyoung
Reviews.Content: nice staff friendly grounds stunning property entrance filled beautiful landscape trees flowers lobby nice clean relaxing inviting upgraded bed linens fluffy pillows towels comfortable beds restaurants near hotel definitely car location near tourist sites freeways pretty close parking free hotel try wont disappointed
